wikipedia_page.main: Janet L. Wolff (born Janet Loeb); February 21, 1920 – July 29, 2014) was an American advertising executive who was a key figure at J. Walter Thompson Co. (JWT) and William Esty Co.

link_mentions.page: American Advertising Federation Hall of Fame

response: **Janet L. Wolff, American advertising executive who guided numerous successful ad campaigns as a vice president of the J. Walter Thompson Co. and William Esty Co. agencies, and inductee into the Advertising Hall of Fame; as Janet Loeb in San Francisco (d. 2014)
